properties.name: ara.scheduling.enable
properties.description: Enable all scheduled tasks (eg. execution & defect indexing). False during integration tests. Prefer disabling individual schedulers in project settings instead of disabling this altogether.

properties.name: ara.adapter.fetcher.name
properties.description: The service to instantiate to fetch execution reports from the continuous integration server: either 'filesystem' or any other custom adapter.

properties.name: ara.executionSchedulingEnabled
properties.description: Enable or disable periodic scans of new execution jobs to index.

properties.name: ara.executionSchedulingDelayInMilliseconds
properties.description: The time (in milliseconds) between two periodic scans of new execution jobs to index. Must be positive.

properties.name: ara.executionSchedulingInitialDelayInMilliseconds
properties.description: The time (in milliseconds) before the first periodic scan of new execution jobs to index (to eg. not stress out server after startup).

properties.name: ara.defectSyncSchedulingDelayInMilliseconds
properties.description: The time (in milliseconds) between two periodic synchronizations of problem statuses from defect states. Must be positive.

properties.name: ara.defectSyncSchedulingInitialDelayInMilliseconds
properties.description: The time (in milliseconds) before the first periodic synchronization of problem statuses from defect states (to eg. not stress out server after startup).
